title: TikTok Sues Montana Over State's Ban of Its Service
description: The legal action comes days after some of the platform’s users sued the state’s attorney general, arguing the law violated the First Amendment.

title: China's New Chip Ban on Micron Puts South Korea in a Delicate Spot
description: A new Chinese clampdown on U.S. chip giant Micron Technology has put South Korea into an uncomfortable position.

title: As Preteens Ignore Social-Media Limits, Governments Push for Better Checks
description: Lawmakers in the U.S. and Europe propose age-verification tools, sparking debate over digital rights.

title: Applied Materials to Build $4 Billion Chip Research Facility in Silicon Valley
description: The aim is to speed development of advanced semiconductors through “inclusive innovation.”
